fences.title: Fences
fences.overview: In 1950s Pittsburgh, a frustrated African-American father struggles with the constraints of poverty, racism, and his own inner demons as he tries to raise a family.

the imitation game.title: The Imitation Game
the imitation game.overview: Based on the real-life story of English mathematician and logician, Alan Turing, the film portrays the nail-biting race against time by Turing and his team of code-breakers to crack the Nazi Enigma code during World War II.

road house.title: Road House
road house.overview: Bouncer-for-hire Patrick Swayze sets out to clean up the baddest honkytonk in a Missouri town.

reservoir dogs.title: Reservoir Dogs
reservoir dogs.overview: Six criminals, hired to steal diamonds, do not know each other's true identity. When the heist gets violently ambushed by the police, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

predestination.title: Predestination
predestination.overview: Tomorrow is History. Predestination chronicles the life of a temporal agent sent on an intricate series of time-travel journeys designed to ensure the continuation of his law enforcement career for all eternity. Now, on his final assignment, the agent must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time.

mulhulland drive.title: Mulholland Drive
mulhulland drive.overview: After a car wreck on the winding Mulholland Drive renders a woman with amnesia, she and a perky Hollywood-hopeful search for clues across Los Angeles in a twisting neo-noir from the mind of visionary David Lynch.

one flew over the cuckoo's nest.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
one flew over the cuckoo's nest.overview: A small-time criminal fakes insanity in hopes of doing easy time in a mental hospital.
one flew over the cuckoo's nest.originalTitle: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

the whale.title: The Whale
the whale.overview: Winner of Best Actor at the 2023 Academy Awards, The Whale follows Charlie (Brendan Fraser), a reclusive English teacher suffering from severe obesity as he attempts to reconnect with his estranged teenage daughter for one last chance at redemption.

titanic.title: Titanic
titanic.overview: A society girl abandons her haughty fiance for a penniless artist on the ill-fated ship's maiden voyage.

the hurt locker.title: The Hurt Locker
the hurt locker.overview: Follows the new head of an elite squad of soldiers tasked with disarming bombs, who recklessly plunges his team into a deadly game of urban combat as the city explodes into chaos. Winner of six Academy Awards including Best Picture.

dazed and confused.title: Dazed and Confused
dazed and confused.overview: A diverse group of high school kids in 1976 celebrate the end of the school year.

uncle buck.title: Uncle Buck
uncle buck.overview: When Cindy and her husband, Bob, have to leave town for a family emergency, there is only one person available to babysit for their three kids: Bob's lazy, carefree brother, Buck. While he immediately gets along with the two younger children, Buck must change his bachelor lifestyle if he wants to be a responsible caregiver for the angst-filled teenager, Tia.

super 8.title: Super 8
super 8.overview: J.J. Abrams and Steven Spielberg join forces in this extraordinary story of six friends who witness a train wreck while making a super 8 movie, only to learn that something unimaginable escaped during the crash.

teen wolf.title: Teen Wolf
teen wolf.overview: Scott's a young high school sophomore who has always been on the outside looking in. No girlfriend, bad at sports and socially awkward. But a single wolf bite changes everything. Now Scott has super-human abilities which lead him to become the star of his lacrosse team.

episodes.title: The Girl Who Knew Too Much
Said The Spider To The Fly

better off dead.title: Better Off Dead...
better off dead.overview: Lane (John Cusack) resolves to commit suicide after his girlfriend dumps him for the captain of the ski team. His unsuccessful attempts only lead him into more awkward and embarrassing situations, and eventually to a race that has unexpected results.

galaxy quest.title: Galaxy Quest
galaxy quest.overview: The cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race mistake their TV transmissions for "historical documents" and beam up the crew of has-been actors to save the universe.

say anything.title: Say Anything...
say anything.overview: A noble underachieving high school senior, Lloyd Dobler wants nothing more than to go out with beautiful valedictorian, Diane Court. Lloyd attempts to win her heart over the objections of her over-protective father before Diane leaves for college on a scholarship in England.

once upon a time in america.title: Once Upon a Time in America
once upon a time in america.overview: A former Prohibition-era gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan thirty years after a self-imposed exile, to confront his past and make amends for his mistakes. WARNING: Contains Medium Level Violence and Sex Scenes.
once upon a time in america.originalTitle: Once Upon a Time in America

little shop of horrors.title: Little Shop of Horrors
little shop of horrors.overview: Seymour works in a rundown flower shop on Skid Row and seeks a way of bringing the shop - and himself - fame and fortune. He buys an exotic plant - Audrey - which proves good for business, but gradually he's horrified to learn that it craves blood and flesh and must satisfy its appetite...

shawshank redemption.title: The Shawshank Redemption
shawshank redemption.overview: Red (Morgan Freeman) and Andy (Tim Robbins), both incarcerated at Shawshank prison, forge an unlikely bond that will span more than twenty years. Together they discover hope as the ultimate means of survival, in a poignant tale of the human spirit.

planes trains and automobiles.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
planes trains and automobiles.overview: An irritable marketing executive, Neal Page, is heading home to Chicago for Thanksgiving when a number of delays force him to travel with a well-meaning but overbearing salesman, Del Griffith.

spinal tap.title: This Is Spinal Tap
spinal tap.overview: Cult comedy 'rockumentary' following a legendary heavy metal band as they tour America.

best in show.title: Best in Show
best in show.overview: The tension is palpable, the excitement is mounting and the scent of competition is in the air as hundreds of contestants from America prepare to take part in the Mayflower Dog Show.

48 hours.title: 48 Hrs.
48 hours.overview: A streetwise convict (Eddie Murphy) teams up with a cantankerous cop (Nick Nolte) to track down two cold-blooded killers.

trading places.title: Trading Places
trading places.overview: The story of a down-and-out con artist who trades lifestyles with a well-to-do investor.

the producers.title: The Producers
the producers.overview: A struggling producer and timid accountant scheme to make money by putting on a Broadway show they know will flop, so none of the numerous investors will expect their cash back.

it's a wonderful life.title: It's a Wonderful Life
it's a wonderful life.overview: The holiday classic to define all holiday classics, It's A Wonderful Life follows George Bailey, a man with so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - only for an angel to show him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Clerks.title: Clerks
Clerks.overview: Kevin Smith's cult classic follows a day in the life of two convenience store workers. Low-key comedy starring Jeff Anderson.

The Big Lebowski.title: The Big Lebowski
The Big Lebowski.overview: Jeff Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and his bowling buddies to help get it.

The Royal Tennenbaums.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
The Royal Tennenbaums.overview: Royal Tenenbaum and his wife Etheline had three children and then they separated. All three children are extraordinary --- all geniuses. Virtually all memory of the brilliance of the young Tenenbaums was subsequently erased by two decades of betrayal, failure, and disaster. Most of this was generally considered to be their father's fault. "The Royal Tenenbaums" is the story of the family's sudden,

almost famous.title: Almost Famous
almost famous.overview: In 1973, 15-year-old William Miller's unabashed love of music and aspiration to become a rock journalist lands him an assignment from Rolling Stone magazine to interview and tour with the up-and-coming band, Stillwater.

fast times at ridgemont high.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
fast times at ridgemont high.overview: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.

zoolander.title: Zoolander
zoolander.overview: Derek, a model, loses hope when his rival wins the coveted title of Male Model of the Year. In a bid to revive his career, a designer offers him a runway show but ends up convincing him to kill the prime minister of Malaysia.

django unchained.title: Django Unchained
django unchained.overview: Django is a freed slave, who, with the help of a German bounty hunter, set out to track down Django’s slave wife and liberate her from an evil plantation owner.

the untouchables.title: The Untouchables
the untouchables.overview: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness (Kevin Costner) sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone (Robert De Niro), and because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.

there will be blood.title: There Will Be Blood
there will be blood.overview: An oil man and his son at the turn of the 20th century are challenged by a young preacher and take a journey into an abyss of madness. Love, hope, belief, and the bond between father and son is imperiled by corruption, deception, and the flow of oil.

annie hall.title: Annie Hall
annie hall.overview: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer (Woody Allen) falls in love with the ditsy Annie Hall, played by Diane Keaton.

the wild bunch.title: The Wild Bunch
the wild bunch.overview: Receiving two Academy Award nominations, this bitter, brutal story of magnificent losers in a dying West remains one of the screen's all-time classics.

coraline.title: Coraline
coraline.overview: Wandering her rambling old house in her boring new town, Coraline discovers a hidden door to a fantasy version of her life. In order to stay in the fantasy, she must make a frighteningly real sacrifice...

sleepy hollow.title: Sleepy Hollow
sleepy hollow.overview: In this modern-day twist on Washington Irving's classic, ICHABOD CRANE is resurrected and pulled two and a half centuries through time to find that the world is on the brink of destruction, forcing him to team up with a contemporary police officer to unravel a mystery that dates back to the founding fathers.

fantastic mr fox.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox
fantastic mr fox.overview: The temptation of his former fowl-stealing life proves too tough to resist for one incorrigible fox in Wes Anderson's Oscar(R)-nominated animated adaptation of Roald Dahl's classic children's book. Voiced by George Clooney, Mr. Fox is a family man and journalist who secretly returns to his chicken-stealing ways, setting off a war with a trio of the meanest farmers around.

donnie darko.title: Donnie Darko
donnie darko.overview: Arguably the first cult classic of the new millennium, featuring an evocative soundtrack of 80s classics; DONNIE DARKO follows teenager Donnie, who is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that tells him the world is going to end in 28 days.

eternal sunshine of the spotless mind.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
eternal sunshine of the spotless mind.overview: Relationship on the skids leads one partner, then the other, to a neurologist who specializes in removing all memories of a person from one's brain.
eternal sunshine of the spotless mind.originalTitle: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind

terminator.title: The Terminator
terminator.overview: AMC Presents: During a war between humans and machines, a cyborg travels back in time to kill the mother of the opposition's leader. He must fight a soldier sent from the future to protect the girl.

cape fear.title: Cape Fear
cape fear.overview: In Martin Scorsese's remake of the 1962 thriller, attorney Sam Bowden must protect his wife and daughter from violent sex offender Max Cady.

the hangover.title: The Hangover
the hangover.overview: When three friends finally come to after a raucous night of bachelor-party revelry, they find a baby in the closet and a tiger in the bathroom. But they can't seem to locate their best friend, Doug – who's supposed to be tying the knot.

animal house.title: Animal House
animal house.overview: Dean Wormer has plans to rid the campus of the Delta House forever, but the Delta boys have plans of their own. Directed by John Landis and starring John Belushi.
